page.textitem: DESCRIPTION AND OTHER PARTICULARS OF PROPERTY
(State streets, lots, or streams by which bounded or names of owners of adjoining lands)
Under the provisions of Republic Act No. 7160, I HEREBY CERTIFY that the current and fair market
value (x) of the foregoing described property of which I am the owner/administrator, is to the best of my
Subscribed and sworn to before me this
person taking oath presenting Community Tax Certificate No.
(x) State in the nearest multiple of 10 as P950
instead of P948; P1000 instead of P1,004.
TAX UNDER THIS DECLARATION BEGINS WITH THE
ENTERED IN THE REAL PROPERTY ASSESSMENT ROLL
